info.title: OpenNEM
info.description: An Open Platform for Australian Electricity Market Data

parameters.name: only_approved
parameters.description: Only show approved stations not those pending (default false)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Partial match for name allowed (eg MELB)

get.summary: Get a Single Network Station by Code

get.description: Get Power Network Region By Fueltech

get.description: Get Emission Factor Per Network Region
Return fueltech proportion of demand for a network

get.summary: Get Price History By Network and Network Region
get.description: Returns network and network region price info for interval which defaults to network interval size
